rules_text:
First strike
[i]Sunlit Bloom[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Soleil, Sunlit Swordswoman attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, untap each other creature you control.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{G}{W}
